questions.question: What is the main difference between React and Angular?
options: React is a library, Angular is a framework
Angular is a library, React is a framework

questions.question: What is the main difference between SQL and NoSQL?
options: SQL is relational, NoSQL is non-relational
NoSQL is relational, SQL is non-relational

questions.question: What is the main difference between REST and GraphQL?
options: REST uses multiple endpoints, GraphQL uses single endpoint
GraphQL uses multiple endpoints, REST uses single

questions.question: What is the main difference between JavaScript and TypeScript?
options: TypeScript adds static typing to JavaScript

questions.question: What is the main difference between let and var in JavaScript?
options: let has block scope, var has function scope
var has block scope, let has function scope

questions.question: What is the main difference between == and === in JavaScript?
options: == performs type coercion, === does strict comparison

questions.question: What is the main difference between class and functional components in React?
options: Class components use classes, functional use functions with hooks
Functional use classes, class use functions

questions.question: What is the main difference between MongoDB and MySQL?
options: MongoDB is NoSQL document database, MySQL is SQL relational
MySQL is NoSQL, MongoDB is SQL

questions.question: What is the main difference between Git and GitHub?
options: Git is version control system, GitHub is hosting service
GitHub is version control, Git is hosting

questions.question: What is the main difference between HTTP and HTTPS?
options: HTTPS is HTTP with SSL/TLS encryption

questions.question: What is the main difference between synchronous and asynchronous?
What is the main difference between frontend and backend?
options: Frontend is user interface, backend is server-side logic
Backend is interface, frontend is server

questions.question: What is the main difference between compiled and interpreted languages?
options: Compiled translated before execution, interpreted at runtime

questions.question: What is the main difference between static and dynamic typing?
options: Static checked at compile time, dynamic at runtime
Dynamic at compile, static at runtime

questions.question: What is the main difference between Docker and Virtual Machine?
options: Docker shares host OS, VM has guest OS
VM shares host, Docker has guest

questions.question: What is the main difference between microservices and monolith?
options: Microservices are separate services, monolith is single unit
Monolith is separate, microservices are single

questions.question: What is the main difference between SQL and MySQL?
options: SQL is language, MySQL is database system
MySQL is language, SQL is database

questions.question: What is the main difference between let and const in JavaScript?
options: let can be reassigned, const cannot
const can be reassigned, let cannot

questions.question: What is the main difference between array and object in JavaScript?
options: Array uses numeric indices, object uses keys
Object uses numeric, array uses keys

questions.question: What is the main difference between GET and POST?
options: GET retrieves data, POST submits data

questions.question: What is the main difference between PUT and PATCH?
options: PUT updates entire resource, PATCH partial update

questions.question: What is the main difference between state and props in React?
options: State is internal, props are passed from parent
Props are internal, state is passed

questions.question: What is the main difference between CSS and SCSS?
options: SCSS is CSS preprocessor with variables and nesting
CSS is preprocessor, SCSS is not

questions.question: What is the main difference between localStorage and sessionStorage?
options: localStorage persists, sessionStorage clears on tab close

questions.question: What is the main difference between async and await?
options: async declares async function, await pauses execution
